adjectives.description: anachronistic (comparative more anachronistic, superlative most anachronistic)

entries.meaning: Erroneous in date; containing an anachronism; in a wrong time; not applicable to or not appropriate for the time.
examples: If you know where to look in the movie, you can spot an anachronistic wrist watch on one of the Roman soldiers.

entries.meaning: (of a person) Having opinions from the past; preferring things or values of the past; behind the times; overly conservative.
